events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this purchase does not suit my needs.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back related to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I understand your concern about the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached the photo showing the wrong product delivered to me.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days. No need to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick response and the decision not to require returning the wrong item. This solution works well for me.
The refund case has been marked as resolved. Your refund will be completed shortly, and you will receive a confirmation email.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can do to assist you.
Yes, the refund was received today. Thank you for the excellent support throughout the process!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the refund case, and please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
